availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Simpson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mariah A. Blackburn. Father of S. Blackburn, W. T. Blackburn, Robert S. Blackburn, Lucinda Blackburn, Jane Blackburn, Mary E. Blackburn, and James K. Blackburn. Farmer in Simpson County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Simpson County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 6A-B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Simpson County, p. 81.
